exports.exportFieldsTip: Comma separated list of fields to export (in database field format - see help page)
exports.exportFieldsHelp: This is a list of Database Fields, please consult the help page for field Database values (click the owl, then the fields section)
exports.missingFieldsErr: No fields to export. Make sure the sessions table has columns or fields are correctly configured.
exports.unknownErr: An unexpected error occurred during export.

intersection.title: Export Intersection
intersection.exportFieldsTip: Comma separated list of fields to display (in expression field format - see help page)
intersection.exportFieldsHelp: This is a list of field expressions, please consult the help page for field expression values (click the owl, then the fields section)
intersection.noFieldsErr: No fields to display. Make sure there is a comma separated list of field expression values, please consult the help page for field expression values (click the owl, then the fields section).

packetOptions.enableUncompressingTip: Note: all packets will be requested
packetOptions.showFilesTip: Note: all packets will be requested
packetOptions.noPacketSelector: Displaying all packets for this session.  You cannot select the number of packets because Show Images & Files OR Enable Uncompressing might need all packets.

remove.scrubPCAPTip: Perform a three pass overwrite when possible of all packet data for matching sessions.
remove.deleteSPIDataTip: Non forensically remove SPI data for matching sessions.
remove.unknownError: An error occurred while removing data.

send.tagsPlaceholder: Enter a comma separated list of tags
send.info: This will send the SPI and PCAP data to the remote Arkime instance.
send.unknownErr: An error occurred while sending sessions.

field.viewerCrashed: Maybe viewer crashed? Or a proxy or firewall is blocking?  Or you're using an
field.openSessionTip: Open in Sessions with {query} added to the search expression
field.newSessionsTip: Open a new Sessions tab with {query} added to the search expression
field.newSessionsOnly: New Sessions Tab (with only this value)
field.newSessionsOnlyTip: Open a new Sessions tab with {query} as the search expression

sessions.customColumnMsg: Save or load custom column configuration
sessions.customColumnUpdate: Update this column configuration with the currently visible columns
sessions.customInfoMsg: Save or load custom info field configuration
sessions.customInfoName: Enter new info field configuration name
sessions.customInfoReset: Reset info column to default fields
sessions.customInfoUpdate: Update this info field configuration with the currently visible columns

views.usersPlaceholder: Enter a comma separated list of users who can view this view
views.saveColumnsTip: Save the visible sessions table columns and sort order with this view. When applying this view, the sessions table will be updated.

users.searchPlaceholder: Begin typing to search for users by name, id, or role
users.searchUserPlaceholder: Begin typing to search for users by name or id
users.userIdTip: The ID used for login (cannot be changed once created)
users.enabledTip: Is the account currently enabled for anything?
users.webEnabledTip: Can access the web interface. When off only APIs can be used
users.headerAuthEnabledTip: Can login using the web auth header. This setting doesn't disable the password so it should be scrambled
users.rolesTip: These roles are applied across apps (Arkime, Parliament, WISE, Cont3xt).
users.roleAssignersTip: These users can assign this role to other users.
users.lastUsedTip: The last time Arkime was used by this account
users.newPasswordMsg: You must enter a new password
users.confirmPasswordMsg: You must confirm your new password
users.mismatchedPasswordMsg: Your new password and confirmation do not match
users.noUsersOrRolesMatch: No users or roles match your search
users.restrictedTip: This user has additional restricted permissions'
users.forcedExpressionTip: An Arkime search expression that is silently added to all queries. Useful to limit what data can be accessed (e.g. which nodes or IPs)
users.queryTimeLimitTip: Maximum time range that can be queried. This is a safety mechanism to prevent large queries from being run. Set to "All" to disable.

roles.name: Name
roles.pageTip: These are roles you manage. Assign users to them with the dropdowns under Members.

notifiers.helpViewer: Configure notifiers that can be added to periodic queries and hunt jobs.
notifiers.helpParliament: Configure notifiers that can be used to alert on issues within your Parliament
notifiers.title: Notifiers
notifiers.nameInfo: Be specific with your notifier name. There can be multiple {type} notifiers.
notifiers.createHelp: Create one by clicking one of the buttons above.
notifiers.uniqueName: Give your {type} notifier a unique name
notifiers.name: Name
notifiers.unqiueNameErr: Your new notifier must have a unique name
